verses.verse: The king's <S%H3820>heart<s%> is [like] <S%H6388>channels<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> He <S%H5186>turns<s%> it <S%H5921>wherever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> He <S%H2654>wishes.<s%>
<S%H3605>Every<s%> man's <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts.<s%>
To <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> Is <S%H977>desired<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>rather<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>
<S%H7312>Haughty<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> The <S%H9327>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> is <S%H9128>sin.<s%>

The <S%H4284>plans<s%> of the <S%H9167>diligent<s%> [lead] <S%H389>surely<s%> to <S%H4195>advantage,<s%> But <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H213>hasty<s%> [comes] <S%H389>surely<s%> to <S%H4270>poverty.<s%>
The <S%H6467>getting<s%> of <S%H214>treasures<s%> by a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> Is a <S%H5086>fleeting<s%> <S%H1892>vapor,<s%> the <S%H1245>pursuit<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The <S%H7701>violence<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H1641>drag<s%> them <S%H1641>away,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6213>act<s%> with <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H2054>guilty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H2019>crooked,<s%> But as for the <S%H2134>pure,<s%> his <S%H6467>conduct<s%> is <S%H3477>upright.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H6438>corner<s%> of a <S%H1406>roof,<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2267>shared<s%> with a <S%H4066>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H183>desires<s%> <S%H9563>evil;<s%> His <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2603>finds<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2603>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

When the <S%H9238>scoffer<s%> is <S%H6064>punished,<s%> the <S%H6612>naive<s%> <S%H2449>becomes<s%> <S%H7919>wise;<s%> But when the <S%H2449>wise<s%> is <S%H7919>instructed,<s%> he <S%H3947>receives<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>one<s%> <S%H7919>considers<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H5557>Turning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to <S%H9563>ruin.<s%>
He who <S%H331>shuts<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> to the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> Will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> and not be <S%H6030>answered.<s%>
A <S%H4976>gift<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H3711>subdues<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> And a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
The <S%H6213>execution<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%> is <S%H8057>joy<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> But is <S%H4288>terror<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
A <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H8582>wanders<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7919>understanding<s%> Will <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7496>dead.<s%>

He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H8057>pleasure<s%> [will <S%H6238>become<s%>] a <S%H4270>poor<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> will not become <S%H6238>rich.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> And the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> is in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> with a <S%H4066>contentious<s%> and <S%H3708>vexing<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
There is <S%H2530>precious<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> in the <S%H5116>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> But a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1104>swallows<s%> it up.
He who <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H2617>loyalty<s%> <S%H4672>Finds<s%> <S%H9132>life,<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H9202>honor.<s%>

A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H5927>scales<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> And <S%H3381>brings<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5797>stronghold<s%> in <S%H4009>which<s%> they <S%H4009>trust.<s%>
He who <S%H8104>guards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H8104>Guards<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
<S%H2086>"Proud,<s%>" <S%H3093>"Haughty,<s%>" <S%H9238>"Scoffer,<s%>" are his <S%H8034>names,<s%> Who <S%H6213>acts<s%> with <S%H2087>insolent<s%> <S%H2087>pride.<s%>
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H4191>puts<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> For his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6213>work;<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long he is <S%H183>craving,<s%> While the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> and does not <S%H2820>hold<s%> <S%H2820>back.<s%>

The <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination,<s%> <S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H935>brings<s%> it with <S%H2154>evil<s%> <S%H2154>intent!<s%>
A <S%H3577>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will perish, But the <S%H6>man<s%> who <S%H376>listens<s%> [to the truth] will <S%H8085>speak<s%> <S%H1696>forever.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5810>shows<s%> a <S%H5810>bold<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> But as for the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> he <S%H3559>makes<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3559>sure.<s%>
<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> And <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
The <S%H5483>horse<s%> is <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle,<s%> But <S%H8668>victory<s%> belongs to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
